description:
go.crypto: add exp/terminal as code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh/terminal.

This removes the sole "exp/foo" import in the Go subrepos.
A separate CL will remove exp/terminal from the standard Go repository.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=33d6505b6597&repo=crypto ***

go.crypto: add exp/terminal as code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh/terminal.

This removes the sole "exp/foo" import in the Go subrepos.
A separate CL will remove exp/terminal from the standard Go repository.

R=golang-dev, dave, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5966045

LGTM. Not ideal but this will do until there is a broader need for terminal control (either inside the standard lib or otherwise)

On 30/03/2012, at 15:18, dsymonds@golang.org wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
> 
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto
> 
> 
> Description:
> go.crypto: add exp/terminal as code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh/terminal.
> 
> This removes the sole "exp/foo" import in the Go subrepos.
> A separate CL will remove exp/terminal from the standard Go repository.
> 
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5966045/
> 
> Affected files:
>  M ssh/example_test.go
>  M ssh/session_test.go
>  A ssh/terminal/terminal.go
>  A ssh/terminal/terminal_test.go
>  A ssh/terminal/util.go
>

subject: code review 5966045: go.crypto: add exp/terminal as code.google.com/p/go.cry...
